amendment.description: To modify the eligible requirements for blue card status and to increase the fines to be paid by aliens granted such status or legal permanent resident status.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4084 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 35. Record Vote Number: 149.

Amendment SA 4084 proposed by Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S5096-5100, S5104) To modify the eligible requirements for blue card status and to increase the fines to be paid by aliens granted such status or legal permanent resident status.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4084 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 35. Record Vote Number: 149.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4084 proposed by Senator Chambliss.
